paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: 1–22 years of age at diagnosis of ALL
patients.phenotype: second malignant neoplasm (SMN) after therapy for pediatric acute lymphoblastic leukemia

functional_data.summary: The specific functional impact of this variant was not detailed in the paper.

variants.evidence_level: likely pathogenic classification is referred to as class 4
variants.additional_notes: This variant was mentioned in the context of patients with ALL and subsequent SMN.
key_quotes: Among the SMN patients, (likely) pathogenic variants in one of the candidate genes were observed in 3 of 11 (27%) cases with brain tumors, 5 of 28 (18%) with other solid tumors, and 8 of 36 (22%) with hematologic SMN.

tables_processed.table_caption: (Likely) pathogenic variants determined in patients with acute lymphoblastic leukemia with or without second malignancies.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the BRCA2 gene was found in the provided text.
